data.description:
Explore training SparkCodeIntelligence on git history to learn code evolution patterns. Potential approaches:
1. Train on commit diffs to learn change patterns (what changes together)
2. Use commit messages + changed files to predict future changes
3. Learn refactoring patterns from historical code transformations
4. Integrate with ML file prediction for temporal awareness
5. Build a 'code evolution' model that understands how codebase grows

Key questions:
- How to tokenize diffs intelligently (additions/deletions/context)?
- Should we weight recent commits more heavily?
- Can we learn from commit message → file mapping?
- Integration with existing call graph for impact prediction?
data.title: Investigate training SparkSLM on full git history
